sourcesContent:
<template>
    <>
</template>

<script>
    import 
    export default{
        data() {
        return {
            title: 'List of names',
            participants: 'Input unique participant name',
            inputValue: '',
            names: new Set(),
            group: '',
            groupName: 'Input unique group name'
        }
    },

    methods: {
        
        addName() {
            if (this.inputValue !== '') {
                if (this.names.has(this.inputValue)) {
                    alert('Please, input UNIQUE participant name');
                } else {
                    this.names.add(this.inputValue);
                }
                this.inputValue = '';
            }
        },

        deleteName(name) {
            console.log(name);
            this.names.delete(name)
        },

        acceptListOfNames(){
            if (this.names.size < 3) {
                alert(`Please add more participants. You need at least 3 to play. Right now you have ${this.names.size}`);
            } else if (this.group === '') {
                alert('Please name your group');
            }
        }
    }
    }
</script>
